title: quarkus:help fails

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

Running mvnw quarkus:help generates an error

### Expected behavior

Show generated help info

### Actual behavior

Generates the following error:
```

[INFO] Scanning for projects...                                                                                                                                                                
[INFO]                                                                                                                                                                                         
[INFO] -----------------< org.acme:code-with-quarkus-maven33 >-----------------                                                                                                                
[INFO] Building code-with-quarkus-maven33 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT                                                                                                                                       
[INFO] --------------------------------[ jar ]---------------------------------                                                                                                                
[INFO]                                                                                                                                                                                         
[INFO] --- quarkus-maven-plugin:2.2.3.Final:help (default-cli) @ code-with-quarkus-maven33 ---                                                                                                 
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                                
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE                                                                                                                                                                           
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                                
[INFO] Total time:  3.035 s                                                                                                                                                                    
[INFO] Finished at: 2021-10-06T18:07:44+02:00                                                                                                                                                  
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                                
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.2.3.Final:help (default-cli) on project code-with-quarkus-maven33: Execution default-cli of goal io.quarkus.platform:
quarkus-maven-plugin:2.2.3.Final:help failed: InputStream cannot be null -> [Help 1]                                                                                                           
[ERROR]                                                                                                                                                                                        
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.                                                                                                            
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.                                                                                                                         
[ERROR]                                                                                                                                                                                        
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:                                                                                      
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/PluginExecutionException                                                                                                     
```

### How to Reproduce?

Steps:

1. generate a maven quarkus project
2. run mvnw quarkus:help

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.12" 2021-07-20 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-11.0.12+7 (build 11.0.12+7) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-11.0.12+7 (build 11.0.12+7, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.2.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.1 (05c21c65bdfed0f71a2f2ada8b84da59348c4c5d) Maven home: C:\Users\JeffMAURY\.m2\wrapper\dists\apache-maven-3.8.1-bin\2l5mhf2pq2clrde7f7qp1rdt5m\apache-maven-3.8.1 Java version: 11.0.12, vendor: Eclipse Foundation, runtime: C:\Users\JeffMAURY\.sdkman\candidates\java\current Default locale: fr_FR, platform encoding: Cp1252 OS name: "windows 10", version: "10.0", arch: "amd64", family: "windows"

### Additional information

_No response_
